A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thoroughly enjoyed the film. It was a major departure from a more predictable plot that I feared this trilogy would go. Am I disappointed that many of the fan theories and predicted plot tools were nullified with this film? A little\, sure. I had my own theories that were ended by this film\, and yeah it kind of sucks that I was wrong. But moreso\, I am gratuitously pleased that I was shocked in this movie\, that the plot turned in ways I did not foresee\, and that I truly have no idea how this story will end in the final episode. I am excited for where this film has taken us\, as we are now in uncharted territory.
